introPageInstructions:
In this activity, you'll be able to color and build your own story of Saint Marie of the Incarnation!

For each page of story, you'll color the image and select a caption from the captions provided.

Youâ€™ll see all your pictures with the captions you selected at the end.

You can save your story to your device to continue working later. You can also print your story when you get to the end.

Click the Next arrow to get started!

Note: If you'd like to complete a previously saved story, use the Import Saved Story below.

captionOptions.captionLabel: Build in your soul an interior solitude that you can keen everywhere. There, live in God.
God expects great things from you if you let him handle your heart.
God has his hour and he'll enable you to accomplish what he has determined for you from all eternity.
How good is to rely only on the Providence of such a good Father.
Jesus knows what he wants to do with us, let us be glad to let Him do it.
I am surprised that knowing that God is our Father, we aren't always happy.
Build in your soul an interior solitude that you can keen everywhere. There, live in God.

Build in your soul an interior solitude that you can keen everywhere. There, live in God.
God expects great things from you if you let him handle your heart.
God has his hour and he'll enable you to accomplish what he has determined for you from all eternity.
How good is to rely only on the Providence of such a good Father.
Jesus knows what he wants to do with us, let us be glad to let Him do it.
I am surprised that knowing that God is our Father, we aren't always happy.
It is not enough to do God's will, we must do it with interior love and exterior good grace.
May God be blessed for everything. He is my all and my life wherever I may be.
May the peace and love of Jesus be my affectionate greeting for you.
My loving Jesus, by the sanctity of your actions, sanctify mine.
The Spirit of grace who guided me, made me over come all difficulties.
The love and the life of Jesusbe your heritage.

summaryInstructions: Congratulations, you've completed your story! Be sure to save and print your story so you don't lose it.
